01.name: Most Goals in a Calendar Year
01.title: A record impossible to break
01.description: 91 goals in 69 matches with 29 assists. At the end of 2012, Messi beat the previous all-time best set in 1972 by Germany and Bayernâ€™s Gerd MÃ¼ller, who got 85. The Argentinian got 79 goals for BarÃ§a and another 12 for his national team. This included a record 21 consecutive match scoring streak.

02.name: Most European Golden Shoes
02.title: But, I'm not even a striker
02.description: Though playing many various positions, Messi has racked up 6 golden shoes thus far. 3 you can say as a false 9 which is not technically a striker and the other 3 virtually as a CAM which makes this feat stand out even more. He has won boots in 2010/11, 2011/12, 2012/13, 2016/17, 2017/18 and 2018/19 with a minimum winning out put of 34 and high of 50

03.name: Longest Scoring Streak
03.title: This is not repeatable
03.description: He holds the world record for the most consecutive league matches scored in (21 matches; 33 goals) and in the process became the first player to score against every team in a league consecutively.
